backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister implementing authorization, storage, invite links, user profiles, notifications, and vehicle management with admin checks and shared methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining persisted types and a no-op run function that returns the old actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing various frontend files and components across the project.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hooks rules with basic quality warnings and ignore patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting configuration defining style rules such as quotes, trailing commas, and print width.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines stable interfaces, required review steps, backend API constraints, and verification rules for all changes.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting releases, added features, protected interfaces, and version history.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script that runs all frontend quality gates in CI by executing npm run gates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the PWA manifest, icons, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change‑control compliance, quality gates, testing, and documentation updates.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching strategy with network-first navigation and cache-first static assets, plus cache versioning.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing automated frontend quality gates and how to run them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how developers should use the project’s change-control system during feature work.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation outlining the project's semantic versioning process and version update rules.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router with all application routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI allowing users without access to see an error and optionally claim first-admin rights by submitting profile info.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen displaying profile-load failures with classification, guidance, retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Error screen component that classifies bootstrap errors, supports auto‑retry UI, and allows copying formatted error details.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Displays the app logo at configurable sizes using a static image asset.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper that shows header and footer based on authentication state and renders children content.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for submitting a vehicle‑lost report with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for reporting a found vehicle, submitting a finder note, and closing on success.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with routing, user menu, mobile menu, and conditional admin links.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches unexpected errors and renders a fallback UI.
Fallback screen showing a basic error message and reload button for top‑level failures.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to initiate vehicle transfer requiring PIN verification and showing the resulting transfer code with copy support.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: A dialog component that prompts the user for a PIN, handles submission, and shows errors or loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap loading/error state with bounded auto-retries and manual retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations including admin checks, first-admin onboarding, system stats, and invite code management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login/logout functions, and login status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks to query lost vehicles and mutate lost/found vehicle reports with appropriate cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches user notifications with polling and allows marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Provides a mutation to complete user onboarding and refresh profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Mutations for setting up and updating a user PIN via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Queries and updates the caller's user profile, keyed to the current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Provides mutations to initiate and accept vehicle transfers, invalidating related vehicle queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching user vehicles, a single vehicle, and registering new vehicles via an actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for core i18n configuration.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the i18n provider component.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Empty file placeholder for Arabic translations.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Empty file placeholder for English translations.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Empty file placeholder for Indonesian translations.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty file placeholder for Simplified Chinese translations.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n persistence utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the app’s about page with descriptions, features, and admin contact info.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Provides a form for users to accept vehicle transfers using a transfer code.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system statistics and handling admin access validation with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface to generate, list, and manage invite tokens with copy-to-clipboard support and access checks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user stats, quick actions, and system info on the main dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of lost vehicles with details and report actions.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications and allows marking them as read.
Handles invite-based onboarding, preventing admins from using the form and submitting profile data tied to an invite token.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the user's profile, allowing updates and logout through Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a new vehicle, including uploading a photo with progress tracking.
Manages creating and updating the user’s security PIN with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows full vehicle details, including status and photo, with owner‑only actions for transfer and lost reporting.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Displays the user's registered vehicles with status badges and navigation to vehicle details or registration.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Handles authentication, profile bootstrap, admin bypass rules, and redirects before rendering the main app layout.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a safe actor proxy that handles admin token initialization errors without blocking app startup.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a canonical React Query key for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides utilities for checking and retrieving allowlisted admin principals.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, detects stopped-canister cases, and generates user guidance messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app’s version and build date constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking version, issues, features, and new feature requests for change‑control improvements.
